definition: to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: hui1 fa1 xing4 cun2 chu3 qi4

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical composition of volatile oil from the leaves of Glycyrrhiza Inflata Batal.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析脹果甘草葉的揮發性化學成分。

sentences.english: So purification of less volatile components.
New adhesives do not receive ITTF authorisation if they contain volatile organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 含揮發性有機溶劑的新膠水不能得到國際乒聯的許可。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe method is stable, reliable and suitable for the volatile constituent analysis of traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 結論該方法穩定可靠，適用於中藥揮發性成分的分析。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze essential components of Folium Apocyni Veneti from different habitats.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析不同產地羅布麻葉中揮發性成分。

sentences.english: The volatile aroma compounds was also emphasized here.
sentences.chinese: 並且着重介紹了多種肉香揮發性化合物。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a method of extraction and analysis of volatile oil from Rhizoma curcumaesediment.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一種莪術揮發性成分的提取和分析的方法。

sentences.english: Comparison of the Volatile Sulfur Compounds Levels in Sulcular of Different Periodontal State.
sentences.chinese: 不同牙周狀態下牙周袋內揮發性硫化物水平的比較。

sentences.english: Store the total internally in non volatile memory.
sentences.chinese: 存儲在非揮發性記憶體總內部。

sentences.english: The extremely low volatility provides the good oil gas separation property.
sentences.chinese: 極低的揮發性提供良好的油氣分離性。

sentences.english: So if A is the more volatile component, it has the lower boiling point.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果A的揮發性更高，它的沸點更低。

sentences.english: Around 280 degrees C, Volatile gases and flammable tars are released.
sentences.chinese: 在大約攝氏280度，揮發性的氣體和可燃焦被放出。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the chemical constituents of the volatile oil from Camptotheca acuminata Decaisne.
sentences.chinese: 目的對喜樹不同部位的揮發性成分進行對比研究。

sentences.english: The effection of volatile aroma compound was emphasized here.
sentences.chinese: 着重論述了多種魚香揮發性化合物的作用。

sentences.english: A volatile fraction of petroleum consisting chiefly of pentanes and hexanes.
sentences.chinese: 主要由戊烷和己烷組成的一種揮發性石油餾分。

sentences.english: Avoiding the use of VOC printing materials.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用揮發性有機化合物油印物。
